briefdescription.para: Opaque type for the XSSet objects.
Adds a value in the set.

detaileddescription.para:
The new value will be retained
xsThis
The set object
value
The value to add
void

briefdescription.para: Checks if a set contains a value.

simplesect.para: True if the set contains the value, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of values in the set.
Initializes an empty set with an initial capacity.

parameterdescription.para: Other values, terminated by a NULL fence

briefdescription.para: Increases the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Decrease the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Removes a value in the set.

detaileddescription.para:
The removed value will be released
xsThis
The set object
value
The value to remove
void

briefdescription.para: Replaces a value in the set.

detaileddescription.para:
The old value will be released, and the new will be retained
xsThis
The set object
valueOld
The value to replace
valueNew
The new value
void

briefdescription.para: Sets the internal value pointer to the first value in the set.
